Description.Text:
Gran Hotel Son Net, Luxury Mallorca Mansion
Gran Hotel Son Net is an exquisite luxury Mallorcan Estate, a breathtaking historical mansion dating back to the 17th century, which has been lovingly restored into an elegant sanctuary amid the rugged Sierra Tramuntana Mountains (now a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site) - a mere 20 minutes from Palma- a boutique hotel offering the essence of Mallorcan classicism; rooms are spacious and full of light with glorious vistas.

* Personalised and charming service.
* Son Net offers 31 luxurious bedrooms and suites.
* Located in the Sierra Tramuntana mountains, yet only a 25 minute drive from Palma de Mallorca.
* 2 restaurants; informal dining at the poolside Gazebo serving lunch or the fine dining Oleum Restaurant.
* 30m panoramic swimming pool surrounded by private cabanas.
* 'La Fuente' beauty and treatment centre offering a comprehensive range of treatments.
* Ideally located for Golfers - 22 golf courses on the island and 6 of them within a 30 minute drive of the hotel.

Mallorca's finest boutique hotel - The Son Net Estate dates to 1672, with its original well and patio, set against the rugged Sierra Tramuntana Mountains (now declared a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage Site. The luxury hotel Son Net was opened in 1998. The exterior villa accommodation were constructed using traditional stone, wood and tiles, the handcrafted stucco walls throughout retain the feel of an authentic Mallorcan villa and traditional 'Tela de Lenguas' fabrics, which are hand-crafted on the island have been used in the public areas. Gran Hotel Son Net is on Mallorca, located in the extraordinary Balearic Islands in the Mediterranean Sea. The island is typically Mediterranean, featuring sandy beaches, crystal clear water, pine-clad valleys and rugged, sparse mountain ranges including the island's famous Sierra Tramuntana now declared a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage Site. Hotel also provides free breakfast to its guests.

This luxury hotel is located on a site on top of a gently sloping tree-clad hill in the ancient village of Puigpunyent, set against the 90km long Sierra Tramuntana Mountain range, a short 25 minute/25 Km drive from the airport.

Classic Twin - All Classic rooms are situated ground floor and look out over the Gardens. All rooms feature two twin beds, but King size is also available upon request. Ideally for young couples or single use.

Air Conditioning / Wake up calls / Housekeeping (daily) / Complimentary toiletries / Hair dryer / In-room safe / Television / Iron / ironing board (on request) Superior Double - All Superior rooms are situated on the first floor of the hotel and look out over the interior patios, the Galatz mountain range and the hotel entrance. All superior rooms feature king-size or three twin beds, allowing the guests a choice of accommodation they are most comfortable with. A typical characteristic of Gran Hotel Son Net are the very spacious and comfortable bathrooms.
Internet access - wireless / Air Conditioning / Multi-line phone / Wake up calls / Housekeeping (daily) / Complimentary toiletries / Hair dryer / In-room safe / Television / Iron / Ironing board (on request) Deluxe Junior Suite - Deluxe Junior Suite offers three twin beds or one king bed. Deluxe Rooms are located on the top floor of the building. The views are as pretty as a postcard, overlooking the surrounding valley, home to the small village of Puigpunyent, as well as the splendid pool and the gardens of the hotel. Each room is individually decorated with colours and attention to detail, small and unique, such as a small window in the wall of your shower that allows you to continue contemplating the views or a bull's eye window which allows the first sun rays to announce the beginning of a new day.

Internet access - wireless / Air Conditioning / Voice mail / Wake up calls / Housekeeping (daily) / Complimentary toiletries / Hair dryer / In-room safe / Television Grand Suite - Grand Suite offers one king bed. The two cheerful bright and spacious Grand Suites are located at both corners of the finca. They feature large windows overlooking the swimming pool and the stunning gardens of the hotel as well as open living rooms with tasteful fabrics and elegant furniture. Unique and genuine touches such as an antique telescope and a romantic original bathtub give these suites an authentic feeling.

Internet access - wireless / Air Conditioning / Voice mail / Wake up calls / Housekeeping (daily) / Complimentary toiletries / Hair dryer / In-room safe / Television / Iron / ironing board (on request)
